name: Customization
description: Leave a big impression with these cool range of customised  cards! Make it extra meaningful by adding a personal touch to your greetings.There's truly a perfect card for any one and any situation at the kiss store.

description: The personal and heart felt messages tucked inside the diary, tells stories of love & friendship, that can be cherished for years to come.

name: Explosion box
description: Celebrate in style with our Explosion box cards. Each card is designed  & handcrafted with rich textures and unheard of embellishments, making each card extra special.
